snippet: The results cast doubt on the claim that President Obama has alienated a significant swath of Jewish voters because of his rocky relationship with Israel's prime minister, Benjamin Netanyahu.
abstract: The results cast doubt on the claim that President Obama has alienated a significant swath of Jewish voters because of his rocky relationship with Israel's prime minister, Benjamin Netanyahu.

headline.main: In Poll, Jewish Voters Overwhelmingly Support Obama
headline.print_headline: Jews’ Support for Obama Remains High, Poll Finds
